amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 741, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in Part A of House Report 116-322 is considered to be adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 741, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in Part A of House Report 116-322 is considered to be adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
